title: Adam Lallana will pocket £150,000-a-week after agreeing new £31.2million deal with Liverpool
text:
Ad kops a raise Adam Lallana will pocket £150,000-a-week after agreeing new £31.2million deal with Liverpool 
England international will become one of the top earners at Anfield after becoming one of Jurgen Klopp's key players Exclusive Comments ADAM LALLANA will seal a new £31.2million deal at Liverpool this week. 
The England star has agreed a £150,000-a-week, four-year contract which puts him on a par with Anfield’s other top earners. Getty Images 4 Adam Lallana is set to land £150,000-a-week in a £31.2million deal 
SunSport revealed Kop bosses had started talks to secure Lallana’s future and fresh terms are now on the brink of being announced. 
Keep up to date with ALL the LIVERPOOL news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Lallana , who was a £25m arrival from Southampton in 2014, has two years left on his current contract, but will now be committed to the club until 2021. 
His huge new deal underlines how highly rated he is by Kop boss Jurgen Klopp . 
Lallana has established himself in the Three Lions team and been a key performer for Klopp, who is bringing out the best in him in a slightly deeper midfield role this season. Brazil star Philippe Coutinho recently penned a new five-year deal — and Liverpool moved swiftly to get Lallana on a similar package. 
Paris Saint-Germain had been tracking Lallana, but the new terms show his commitment to Liverpool. 
Lallana has featured in a deep role under Klopp and has made 27 appearances for Liverpool this season, netting seven times. 
Whilst the England star has become an important player for his country and has scored in each of his three appearances for the Three Lions this season.
